about_the_game:
In a shadowy, desolate medieval world teeming with enemies and supernatural threats, a relentless survival challenge awaits. Embark on a desperate journey with your friends to uncover the source of the curse and eradicate it for good. In this brutal co-op experience, every choice you make will shape your fight for survival as you confront both lethal warriors and monstrous creatures.

Explore the cursed lands where no one belongs, a blood-soaked battlefield that transforms fallen souls into nightmarish beings. Amidst the chaos, you and your team advance through treacherous terrain, driven by strategy and bravery to eliminate the root of the curse. Each encounter demands the right combination of weapons and skills to secure your path forward.

Key Features:

  • Rogue-Lite and Extraction Mechanics: Will you escape or risk pressing onward? The choice is yours as you weigh strategy and danger.

  • Rich Combat System: Accessible for beginners with a depth that challenges experienced fighters, offering a high skill ceiling.

  • Extensive Gear Variety: Choose from a range of weapons, armor, and skills to shape a character tailored to your combat style.

  • Mystery and Exploration: Traverse war-torn lands filled with hidden treasures and secrets, battling your way toward victory alongside your team

Prepare for a deadly mission, fighting shoulder-to-shoulder with friends against the dark horrors of a medieval world—humanity’s last hope against the looming curse.
